Articles.Content: I got KSP on steam about a month ago and the main reason I got it is because of the mods, well first I had problems on how to install them and where to put them and then they weren't working correctly but now I am close to having that all fixed but first of all where exactly do you put the contents of the files? I sort all the part in the squad folder but I heard u can just keep it in game data in its folder. second, i can't find the bd armory weapon manager, at first I couldn't find the parts in utility (where they should be) but if I go into the other search with manufacturers and such. I can find the ai pilot system and the Modular Missile Guidance but I am also missing so ammo packs and smokes and I have checked the folder and found the weapon manager. PLEASEEEE HELP

DO NOT put the mods in the squad folder EVER. Go back and delete all the BDarmory things from the Squad folder.

Install directions:

1a.Download BDarmory. (From https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/BDArmory/releases or https://mods.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/248173-bdarmorycontinued)

 b. Download dependencies https://github.com/jrodrigv/PhysicsRangeExtender/releases

2.Open the zip file for both.

3.Copy the GameData folder to the KSP root folder.

If you installed them correctly, there should be a new category in the VAB/SPH called BDarmory and all the parts are in there. 

DO NOT place any GameData folders inside the Gamedata folder, EVER.

 

 

More detailed directions here: 

 

Edited August 2, 2017 by Jas0n

If you installed them correctly, there should be a new category in the VAB/SPH called BDarmory and all the parts are in there. 

DO NOT place any GameData folders inside the Gamedata folder, EVER.

I did install the dependicies and BDArmory file, but it says 'Weapon Manager missing.' What's that? And where do I find it?
